files.patch:
@@ -41,0 +41,8 @@
+# The experimental release suffix is set only in jfx-sandbox repository
+# for a speficic branch. When this property is set it overrides
+# jfx.release.suffix used in build.gradle. This property should remain
+# empty for master branch and for FCS builds.
+# Similar to jfx.release.suffix, the value should be prefixed with a '-' character
+# for example: -metal, -d3d12
+jfx.experimental.release.suffix=
+
